issues.message: [{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Transplant blood vessel organoids under the kidney capsule of immunocompromised NOD/SCID/IL2Rγnull mice. CRITICAL STEP: Inefficient differentiation could lead to teratoma formation in mice.'}] is not of type 'object'

[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Sacrifice mice and collect transplanted blood vessel organoids. If only one kidney is used for transplantation, the kidney without human transplant should be kept as a negative control.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Fix transplants and kidney tissue in 4% PFA solution overnight at 4 °C.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Dehydrate and paraffinize samples according to standard histological procedures.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Cut 2- to 5-μm sections with a standard cryostat and collect them on Ultra Plus slides.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Perform standard de-paraffinization procedures.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Follow Steps 39–45 of the Procedure to stain organoids.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Carefully remove all PBS from the slides with a cellulose wipe.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Add a few drops of mounting medium and lay a coverslip on top. Avoid air bubbles.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Dry overnight in the dark at room temperature.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Seal the slide with nail polish.'}] is not of type 'object'
[{'key': 'note', 'value': 'Proceed to Step 47 of the Procedure to image organoids.'}] is not of type 'object'
